---

# Vendor Authentication

## Required Scopes

Untuk mengakses Vendor API, Anda memerlukan scope berikut:

- `vendor.read` - Read access ke data vendor
- `vendor.write` - Write access untuk update data vendor (Admin only)
- `vendor.evaluate` - Submit evaluasi kinerja vendor

## Getting Access Token

```bash
curl -X POST https://api.inaproc.id/v1/oauth/token \
  -H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" \
  -d "grant_type=client_credentials" \
  -d "client_id=YOUR_CLIENT_ID" \
  -d "client_secret=YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET" \
  -d "scope=vendor.read vendor.evaluate"
```

## Rate Limits

| Endpoint Category | Rate Limit |
|------------------|------------|
| Vendor search | 100 req/min |
| Performance data | 50 req/min |
| Evaluation submit | 10 req/min |

## Permissions

| Role | Permissions |
|------|-------------|
| Public | Basic vendor information |
| Registered User | Full vendor data access |
| Agency Admin | Evaluate vendors from their projects |
| System Admin | Full access including blacklist management |
